core.pg.engine module¶

Copyright (C) 2014 Bradley Alan Smith

Module implements access methods which allow entities to access the database at a particular permission level.

class core.pg.engine.Engine(user=None, drc=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

Engine for PostgreSQL database

core.pg.errors module¶

Module implements Exceptions required by various aspects in the core.

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Bad data.

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Raised when an illegal method name is called

strerror = '!ERROR! 000: Sorry, you requested an illegal method name.'¶

Bases: exceptions.Exception

Query did not specify a table to query from.

core.pg.results module¶

Copyright (C) 2014 Bradley Alan Smith

Module implements the container objects for select results and the rows contained within.

core.pg.select module¶

Copyright (C) 2014 Bradley Alan Smith

Module implements Select, which allows read-only query functionality.

Bases: core.pg.engine.Engine

select(viewid=None, cols=None, join=None, where=None, group_by=None, order_by=None, limit=None)[source]¶

Given, optionally:

  • ‘tblid`
  • cols=[]
  • join=(tblid,joinStmt)
  • where=whereStmt
  • order_by=colname
  • limit=int

selects and returns the [results].

core.pg.select.subid()[source]¶

core.pg.syntax module¶

Copyright (C) 2014 Bradley Alan Smith

Module implements the PostgreSQL syntax as methods which accept parameters and return parameterized SQL and the input values processed for use as substitution parameters by the cursor.

Module contents¶

Copyright (C) 2014 Bradley Alan Smith

Module implements all of the functionality to interact with the PostgreSQL database.
